document.heading: Multiple Dwelling Residence Water Lead Level Test Temporary Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-206, the “Multiple Dwelling Residence Water Lead Level Test Temporary Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-907, and was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 29, 2004, and July 13, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 2, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-488 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-206 became effective on December 7, 2004.
